class_notes: Study Abroad. Course meets abroad from May 19 - June 29, 2024. Apply online at www.studyabroad.emory.edu
course_description: Innovative eBook Italian Virtual Class: engaging approach to language learning, full immersion in Italian culture, literature and art with authentic materials; development of analytical, critical skills, cross-cultural competency and higher than norm linguistic fluency.
